SectionBody.Text: The incorporators of the proposed insurer shall file with the office a copy of a fidelity bond or insurance policy providing coverage in an amount equal to not less than 10 percent of the funds handled annually and issued in the name of the insurer covering its directors, employees, administrator, or other individuals managing or handling the funds or assets of the insurer. In no case may such bond or policy be less than $1,000 or more than $500,000.
